entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:01 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
